document_data.name: Crypt City
document_data.mainbody: '''Crypt City''' referred to a specific section of the coastal town of [[Tulmon]] on the [[Lake of Steam]] that was haunted by [[undead]].<ref name=EotSS-p163">{{Cite web/More Lake of Steam and Dragon Coast}}
document_data.Description: Crypt City covered the entire western half of Tulmon. Aside from the roaming undead, this ruined area was abandoned with the exception of some brave criminals who used it as a base. A set of walls separated the rebuilt section of Tulmon from the dangerous ruins.<ref name=EotSS-p163"/>
